abstract: German sailor Erik Heil, who is being treated for several infections in Berlin hospital, says he is sure that his illness was caused by polluted waters in Rio de Janeiro, where he participated in test sailing event for 2016 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics said they were “extremely concerned” after the German sailor Erik Heil became ill after his third-place finish at a test event there.

headline.main: Sailor Falls Ill After Rio Event
headline.print_headline: Sailor Falls Ill After Rio Event

snippet: Organizers of the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics said they were “extremely concerned” after the German sailor Erik Heil became ill after his third-place finish at a test event there.
